name: wild Wireframe Kit
description:
This is our internal Wireframe Kit we have been using for quite some time. Originally started in Sketch, but due to Figma's Auto Layout feature this has become our go to tool for fast and easy wireframing early on to validate ideas.


It's far from perfect, but it does exactly what it's supposed to do fast and dirty. The distinct visual style should help set it apart and also make sure people are aware that this is not finished visual design â€“ and therefore give more focus on the flow/concept â€“ but also kinda look nice.


We'll be updating this in the coming weeks and months because there are some thing we haven't gotten around to yet ðŸ¤™
